metadata.titleEn: Qilian Mountains integrated observatory network: Dataset of Qinghai Lake integrated observatory network (an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Alpine meadow and grassland ecosystem Superstation, 2021)
metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：青海湖流域地表过程综合观测网（高寒草甸草原混合超级站气象要素梯度观测系统-2021）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Qinghai Lake integrated observatory network obtained from an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of the Alpine meadow and grassland ecosystem Superstation from January 1 to October 9 in 2021. The site (98°35′41.62″E, 37°42′11.47″N) was located in the alpine meadow and alpine grassland ecosystem, near the SuGe Road in Tianjun County, Qinghai Province. The elevation is 3718m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (HMP155; 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), wind speed and direction profile (windsonic; 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), air pressure (PTB110; 3 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 10m of the platform in west by north of tower), four-component radiometer (CNR4; 6m, towards south), two infrared temperature sensors (SI-111; 6 m, towards south, vertically downward), photosynthetically active radiation (PQS1; 6 m, towards south, each with one vertically downward and one vertically upward, soil heat flux (HFP01; 3 duplicates below the vegetation; -0.06 m), soil temperature profile (109; -0.05、-0.10、-0.20、-0.40、-0.80、-1.20、-2.00、-3.00 and -4.00m), soil moisture profile (CS616; -0.05、-0.10、-0.20、-0.40、-0.80、-1.20、-2.00、-3.00 and -4.00m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_3 m, Ta_5 m, Ta_10 m, Ta_15 m, Ta_20 m, Ta_30 m, and Ta_40 m; RH_3 m, RH_5 m, RH_10 m, RH_15 m, RH_20 m, RH_30 m, and RH_40 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_3 m, Ws_5 m, Ws_10 m, Ws_15 m, Ws_20 m, Ws_30 m, and Ws_40 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_3 m, WD_5 m, WD_10 m, WD_15 m, WD_20 m, WD_30m, and WD_40 m) (°), precipitation (rain) (mm), air pressure (press) (hpa), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_D_up and PAR_D_down) (μmol/ (s m-2)), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, and Gs_3) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_5cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_200cm、Ts_300cm、Ts_400cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_5cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_200cm、Ms_300cm、Ms_400cm) (%, volumetric water content).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2018/8/31 10:30. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2021年1月1日至2021年10月9日青海湖流域地表过程综合观测网高寒草甸草原混合草原超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于青海省天峻县苏里路旁侧，下垫面是高寒草甸和高寒草原的混合。观测点经纬度为：东经 98°35′41.62″E，北纬 37°42′11.47″N，海拔3718m。风速/风向、空气温度、相对湿度传感器分别架设在3m、5m、10m、15m、20m、30m、40m处，共7层，朝向正北；气压计安装在3m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在塔西偏北侧10m平台上；四分量辐射仪安装在6m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在6m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处，朝向正南距离塔体2m处；土壤温度探头埋设在地下5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm、200cm、300cm和400cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正东方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm、200cm、300cm和400cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正东方；光合有效辐射仪安装在6m处，探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个，朝向正南。
观测项目有：风速（WS_3m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_20m、WS_30m、WS_40m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_3m、WD_5m、WD_10m、WD_15m、WD_20m、WD_30m、WD_40m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_3m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_20m、Ta_30m、Ta_40m和RH_3m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_20m、RH_30m、RH_40m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒) 、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_5cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_200cm、Ms_300cm、Ms_400cm）(单位：百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_5cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_200cm、Ts_300cm、Ts_400cm）(单位：摄氏度)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2018/8/31 10:30。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the key meteorological elements observed in a high-altitude meadow-steppe mixed superstation data collection method?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在高海拔草甸-草原混合超级站数据收集方法中观察到的关键气象要素有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: wind speed and direction, air temperature, relative humidity, precipitation, atmospheric pressure, surface radiation temperature, upward and downward photosynthetically active radiation, four-component radiation, soil heat flux, soil moisture, soil temperature
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 风速和风向、空气温度、相对湿度、降水、大气压力、地表辐射温度、向上和向下的光合有效辐射、四分量辐射、土壤热通量、土壤湿度、土壤温度

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features and specifications involved in designing a meteorological gradient observation system for high-altitude grasslands?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 设计高海拔草原气象梯度观测系统的关键特征和规格包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wind speed and direction sensors at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m, air temperature and humidity sensors at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m, barometer at 3m, tipping bucket rain gauge on a 10m platform, four-component radiometer at 6m, infrared thermometers at 6m, soil heat flux plates at 6cm depth, soil temperature and moisture sensors at 5cm to 400cm, upward and downward photosynthetically active radiation sensors at 6m, data completeness, remove duplicates, eliminate outliers, mark suspect data visually
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 风速和风向传感器安装在3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米处，空气温度和湿度传感器安装在3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米处，气压计安装在3米处，翻斗式雨量计安装在10米平台上，四分量辐射计安装在6米处，红外测温仪安装在6米处，土壤热通量板安装在6厘米深处，土壤温度和湿度传感器安装在5厘米至400厘米处，向上和向下光合有效辐射传感器安装在6米处，数据完整性，去除重复数据，消除异常值，视觉标记可疑数据。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many layers of sensors are used for measuring wind speed and wind direction in a dataset related to high-altitude grassland meteorological observations?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与高海拔草原气象观测相关的数据集中，用于测量风速和风向的传感器层数是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does '气象要素梯度观测系统' mean in the context of data collection for meteorological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: '气象要素梯度观测系统'在气象研究的数据收集上下文中指的是一种用于监测和记录气象要素（如温度、湿度、气压、风速等）在不同空间位置或高度上的变化的系统。
Definition.AnswerEn: '气象要素梯度观测系统' refers to a meteorological factors gradient observation system used in data collection. It involves the measurement of meteorological parameters such as wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, and relative humidity at different heights or layers to study the vertical gradient of these factors. In the context described, sensors are placed at various heights (3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, and 40m) to collect data on these elements, providing insights into the vertical distribution and variation of meteorological conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: '气象要素梯度观测系统'是用于数据收集的气象因素梯度观测系统。它涉及在不同高度或层次上测量气象参数，如风速、风向、气温和相对湿度，以研究这些因素的垂直梯度。在所描述的背景下，传感器被放置在不同的高度（3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米和40米）以收集这些元素的数据，从而提供对气象条件的垂直分布和变化的洞察。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in ensuring the accuracy and completeness of meteorological data collected from high-altitude mixed meadow and grassland regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 确保从高海拔混合草甸和草原地区收集的气象数据的准确性和完整性面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in ensuring the accuracy and completeness of meteorological data in high-altitude mixed meadow and grassland regions include dealing with harsh weather conditions that can affect sensor performance, potential data loss due to extreme environmental factors, and the need for regular maintenance to prevent data gaps. Additionally, ensuring data quality involves implementing procedures such as marking missing data with specific indicators, removing duplicate records, and filtering out data that falls outside the expected physical range or instrument capacity.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在高海拔混合草甸和草原地区，确保气象数据的准确性和完整性面临的挑战包括应对恶劣天气条件，这可能影响传感器的性能；由于极端环境因素导致的潜在数据丢失；以及需要定期维护以防止数据缺口。此外，确保数据质量还涉及实施一些程序，例如用特定指标标记缺失数据、删除重复记录，以及过滤掉超出预期物理范围或仪器能力的数据。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of implementing a comprehensive surface process observation network in high-altitude meadows and grasslands?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在高海拔草甸和草原实施综合表面过程观测网络的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to gather detailed and precise meteorological data, such as wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, relative humidity, precipitation, and pressure across multiple altitudes, which are crucial for understanding the unique climatic and environmental processes in high-altitude meadows and grasslands. This comprehensive data collection aims to provide insights into surface radiation temperature, soil heat flux, soil moisture, and temperature profiles, which are vital for ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric research in these sensitive and variable environments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是收集详细和精确的气象数据，如风速、风向、气温、相对湿度、降水量和气压，涵盖多个高度，这对于理解高海拔草甸和草原独特的气候和环境过程至关重要。这项全面的数据收集旨在提供对地表辐射温度、土壤热通量、土壤湿度和温度剖面的洞察，这对于在这些敏感和变化多端的环境中进行生态、水文和大气研究是必不可少的。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in setting up a meteorological element gradient observation system in a high-altitude mixed meadow and grassland environment to ensure accurate data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在高海拔混合草甸和草原环境中建立气象元素梯度观测系统以确保准确数据收集涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involve installing sensors for wind speed/direction, air temperature, and relative humidity at multiple heights (3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m) oriented towards the north; setting up barometers at 3m; placing a tipping bucket rain gauge on a platform 10m northwest of the tower; mounting a four-component radiometer at 6m facing south; installing infrared thermometers at 6m facing vertically downwards; embedding soil heat flow plates, temperature, and moisture sensors at specified depths and distances from the meteorological tower; and ensuring proper orientation and placement of photosynthetically active radiation sensors for upward and downward measurements. Data processing and quality control include ensuring 144 data points per day (every 10 minutes), marking missing data with -6999, removing duplicate or erroneous data, and using consistent date and time formatting.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序涉及在多个高度（3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米）安装风速/风向、空气温度和相对湿度传感器，传感器朝向北方；在3米处设置气压计；在距离塔10米的西北方向的平台上放置一个翻斗雨量计；在6米处安装一个四分量辐射计，朝南方向；在6米处安装垂直向下的红外温度计；在指定深度和距离气象塔的位置嵌入土壤热流板、温度和湿度传感器；并确保光合有效辐射传感器的正确朝向和放置，以进行向上和向下的测量。数据处理和质量控制包括确保每天144个数据点（每10分钟一次），用-6999标记缺失数据，删除重复或错误的数据，并使用一致的日期和时间格式。
